vote.title: Authorize settlement of a condemnation proceeding styled City of Dallas v. Pamela Samantha Keats, et al.,  Cause No. 98574-CC, pending in Kaufman County Court at Law, to acquire a tract of land containing approximately 902,535 square feet of land located in Kaufman County for the Lake Tawakoni 144-inch Pipeline Project - Not to exceed $340,600.00, increased from $419,400.00 ($414,400.00, plus closing costs not to exceed $5,000.00) to $760,000.00 ($750,000.00, plus closing costs not to exceed $10,000.00) - Financing: Water Construction Fund
